name: cheri-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is paralyzed, it consumes this item to cure the paralysis. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures paralysis.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when paralyzed to cure paralysis.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from paralysis.
flavor_text.platinum: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from paralysis.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from paralysis.
